Organic are living things.
Organic means an object is living.
Organic matter is a substance that has been produced by plants or animals.
Organic materials are made from plants and animals.
Organic refers to the way agricultural products are grown and processed.
organic
organic materials come from living things.
Organic materials are derived from living things.

Organic refers to the way agricultural products are grown and processed. Organic crops are grown without the use of synthetic pesticides, bioengineered genes (GMOs), petroleum-based fertilizers, and sewage sludge-based fertilizers.
Organic materials are natural materials that are not man-made.
Organic matter, organic material, or natural organic matter refers to the large source of carbon-based compounds found within natural and engineered, terrestrial and aquatic environments.
Organic materials are made out of living organisms or the waste of living organisms.
An organic object is one that is made of carbon.
Organic matter is matter that has come from a once-living organism, such as a plant or animal.
Organic matter, organic material, or natural organic matter refers to the large pool of carbon-based compounds found within natural and engineered, terrestrial and aquatic environments.
A jar is made of glass, which is organic.
Organic matter, organic material, or natural organic matter (NOM) refers to the large pool of carbon-based compounds found within natural and engineered, terrestrial and aquatic environments.
Organic matter is any material that contains carbon.
Organic materials are generally defined as those that contain carbon.
Organic compounds can be made from inorganic materials.
Organic produce is grown without the use of synthetic pesticides, synthetic fertilizers, sewage sludge, genetically modified organisms, or ionizing radiation.
Organic matter, matter that has come from a once-living organism, is capable of decay or the product of decay, or is composed of organic compounds.
Organic foods are foods that are produced using methods of organic farming -- that do not involve modern synthetic inputs such as synthetic pesticides and chemical fertilizers.
The pot is organic.
Flowers are organic.
The bouquet of flowers is organic.
The flowers are organic.
Organic compounds are generally classified as small molecules or macromolecules.

A jar is a rigid, cylindrical or slightly conical container, typically made of glass, clay, or plastic, with a wide mouth or opening that can be closed with a lid, screw cap, lug cap, cork stopper, roll-on cap, crimp-on cap, press-on cap, plastic shrink, heat sealed lidding film, an inner seal, a Tamper-evident band, or other suitable means.

A jar is a rigid, cylindrical or slightly conical container, typically made of glass, ceramic, or plastic, with a wide mouth or opening that can be closed with a lid, screw cap, lug cap, cork stopper, roll-on cap, crimp-on cap, press-on cap, plastic shrink, heat sealed lidding film, an inner seal, a tamper-evident band, or other suitable means.

A jar is a rigid, cylindrical or slightly conical container, typically made of glass, ceramic, or plastic, with a wide mouth or opening that can be closed with a lid, screw cap, lug cap, cork stopper, roll-on cap, crimp-on cap, press-on cap, plastic shrink, heat sealed lidding film, an inner seal, a Tamper-evident band, or other suitable means.
The flower is organic.
A bouquet of flowers is organic.
A canning jar is a glass jar used in home canning to preserve food.
A mason jar is a molded glass jar used in home canning to preserve food.
Organic produce and other ingredients are grown without the use of pesticides, synthetic fertilizers, sewage sludge, genetically modified organisms, or ionizing radiation.
Organic farming is an alternative agricultural system which originated early in the 20th century in reaction to rapidly changing farming practices.
A bouquet is a collection of flowers, leaves, fruits, twigs or other various materials that is constructed to create a pleasing and balanced composition.
